titles.title: Multiemployer Retirees Medical Equity Benefits Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide equity in medical benefits for retirees in multiemployer plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Multiemployer Retirees Medical Equity Benefits Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the use of multiemployer plan contributions for retiree health benefits.
